answerText: Argentina [10] Argentina's cuisine notoriously features a large amount of this type of meat, in no small part due to its gaucho heritage. It recently lost the title of world's largest per capita consumer of this foodstuff to Uruguay.
heading: NASAT  |2014 | 6 | 11 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: A February 2014 cover story in The Economist explained this country's "century of decline," since it was one of the fastest-growing states in the world in 1914. For 10 points each:  [10] Name this second-largest Latin American country.
